data.title: Denver Nuggets Roster, Schedule, Stats (2007-2008)
data.meta_description: 2007-2008: Denver Nuggets roster and stats. Quick access to players bio, career stats and team records.
data.text:
2007-2008 - Points

Allen Iverson scores a season high 51 points for Denver Nuggets

On December 12, 2007, Allen Iverson set a season high in points in a NBA game. That day he scored 51 points in Denver Nuggets's home loss against Los Angeles Lakers, 107-111. He also had 2 rebounds, 8 assists, 1 steal and finished the game with a 45 efficiency.

2007-2008 - Rebounds

Marcus Camby grabs a season high 24 rebounds for Denver Nuggets

On January 01, 2008, Marcus Camby set a season high in rebounds in a NBA game. That day he grabbed 24 rebounds in Denver Nuggets's home win against Utah Jazz, 120-109. He also had 8 points, 1 assist and finished the game with a 34 efficiency.

2007-2008 - Assists

Anthony Carter dishes a season high 15 assists for Denver Nuggets

On January 01, 2008, Anthony Carter set a season high in assists in a NBA game. That day he dished 15 assists in Denver Nuggets's home win against Philadelphia 76ers, 109-96. He also had 5 points, 5 rebounds, 2 steals and finished the game with a 21 efficiency.

2007-2008 - Steals

Allen Iverson has a season high 7 steals for Denver Nuggets

On October 10, 2007, Allen Iverson set a season high in steals in a NBA game. That day he reached 7 steals in Denver Nuggets's home win against Seattle Sonics, 120-103. He also had 25 points, 5 rebounds, 7 steals and finished the game with a 29 efficiency.

2007-2008 - Blocks

Marcus Camby blocks a season high 11 blocks for Denver Nuggets Marcus Camby

On January 01, 2008, Marcus Camby set a season high in blocks in a NBA game. That day he went for 11 blocks in Denver Nuggets's home win against Utah Jazz, 120-109. He also had 8 points, 24 rebounds, 2 steals and finished the game with a 34 efficiency.

2007-2008 - Efficiency

Carmelo Anthony set a season high 55 efficiency for Denver Nuggets

On April 04, 2008, Carmelo Anthony set a season high in efficiency in a NBA game. That day he accomplished 55 efficiency in Denver Nuggets's home loss against Sacramento Kings, 115-118. He also had 47 points, 11 rebounds, 3 steals and finished the game with a 55 efficiency.
